summary: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.
cast: Kôji Imada|Sayaka Maeda|Takashi Fujii|Seiko Takuma|Tomomitsu Yamaguchi|Toshio Sakata|Jôji Shimaki|Rintarou Nishi|Kenichi Chujou
title: Mind Game
